casebody.data:
No. 29,

Orig.

Texas et al. v. Colorado. Crawford C. Martin, Attorney General, for the State of Texas, and Boston E. Witt, Attorney General, for the State of New Mexico, plaintiffs. [For earlier orders herein, see, e. g., 389 U. S. 1000.]

Request of Texas and New Mexico for leave to reply to counterclaim and to otherwise plead granted.

Mr. Justice Marshall took no part in the consideration or decision of this request.
